full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Christine DATE 3/5/05 TIME 9:25 A.M. M Philip OF PHONE/MOBILE state you have it TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE That he called SIGNED IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Jeffry DATE 3/5/05 TIME 2:50 A.M. M Mr. Dobson OF PHONE/MOBILE 212 288 1282 home TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE He will be working later today at home. You can reach him at home tonight. Tomorrow he will be working as well SIGNED IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Jeffry DATE 3/6/05 TIME 10:17 A.M. M Paula Heil OF PHONE/MOBILE 917 518 2484 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE If you would like to go today at 2 to see Grand Prix please give a call SIGNED 07/26/17 Page 2241 IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Jeffry DATE 3/5/05 TIME 7:20 A.M. M Paula Heil OF PHONE/MOBILE 917 518 2484 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE Did you work it? SIGNED DOJ-OGR-00032554 Public Records Request No.: 17-295

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a notepad containing four 'Important Message' forms. The forms are filled out with handwritten notes, and there is a date stamp on one of the forms. The document is likely related to a public records request, as indicated by the 'Public Records Request No.' stamp on the bottom of the page.
